20.eng-name: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sa'd bin Hisham, that:Aishah told him: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) would not say the taslim for two rak'ahs during witr

chapter.eng-name: How to pray witr with three rak'ahs
